sub_topic: Show that every group of order 32 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C32, the dihedral group D16, or one of the six non-abelian groups of order 32.
message_1: How many non-isomorphic groups of order 32 are there and what are their structures?
message_2:
There are 51 non-isomorphic groups of order 32. These groups can be classified into the following structures:

1. Cyclic group: C_32
2. Direct product of two cyclic groups: C_16 × C_2
3. Direct product of three cyclic groups: C_8 × C_2 × C_2
4. Direct product of four cyclic groups: C_4 × C_4 × C_2 × C_2
5. Direct product of five cyclic groups: C_2 × C_2 × C_2 × C_2 × C_2

6-9. Four non-isomorphic groups of order 32 that are a semidirect product of C_16 and C_2.
10-17. Eight non-isomorphic groups of order 32 that are a semidirect product of C_8 and C_4.
18-29. Twelve non-isomorphic groups of order 32 that are a semidirect product of C_8 and C_2 × C_2.
30-37. Eight non-isomorphic groups of order 32 that are a semidirect product of C_4 × C_4 and C_2.
38-51. Fourteen non-isomorphic groups of order 32 that are a semidirect product of C_4 × C_2 × C_2 and C_2.

These 51 non-isomorphic groups can be further studied using their presentations, subgroup lattices, and other algebraic properties.
